definition: to squeeze in/to step in/to take part/to step between (two persons in a relationship)
to insert/stick in/pierce/to take part in/to interfere/to interpose
old variant of 插[cha1]
excessive
foot/to be sufficient/ample

sentences.english: The blackman shrank from any direct participation in politics.
sentences.chinese: 这位黑人回避直接插足政治。

sentences.english: I gar there must be a third person involved.
sentences.chinese: 我猜测一定是有第三者插足。

sentences.english: Yesterday his mother wore a sublime dress even asll asnt the ppaintingsy.
sentences.chinese: 前一天他母亲穿戴一件高雅的连衣裙去插足舞会了。

sentences.english: She had been humiliated by her husband’s involvement with a younger woman and the breakdown of their marriage.
sentences.chinese: 丈夫被更年轻的女人插足造成婚姻破裂，她深感耻辱。

sentences.english: Can I join the sightseeing tour as of this hotel?
sentences.chinese: 我能插足这旅馆的观光团吗？

sentences.english: Maybe you should join the English club.
sentences.chinese: 大概，你该当插足一个英语俱乐部。

sentences.english: Their marriage has broken just because of the other man.
sentences.chinese: 他们婚姻的破裂仅仅因为有第三者插足。

sentences.english: I gather there must be a third person involved.
sentences.chinese: 我猜测一定是有第三者插足。

definition: sb who is romantically involved with sb already in a committed relationship/the other woman/the other man/third person/third party (in dispute)/disinterested party/number three in a list
to rob sb of sth they cherish (idiom)
derailment (railway accident)/to leave the rails/fig. to overstep bounds/fig. to have an extramarital affair
mistress/the other woman (coll.)/grade 3 in elementary school
hidden or secret love affair
to have a foot in both camps/to have a bet each way/to be having an affair
romantic love
marriage upheaval (infidelity, divorce etc)/marriage breakup
marriage arranged following a pregnancy/marriage necessitated by an unplanned pregnancy
married man
lit. to stand with each foot in a different boat (idiom)/fig. to have it both ways/to run after two hares/(especially) to have two lovers at the same time
to do the splits (gymnastics)/(Tw) two-timing (in romantic relationships)/Taiwan pr. [pi1 tui3]
unclear/ambiguous/having an unclear relationship with
see 腳踏兩隻船|脚踏两只船[jiao3 ta4 liang3 zhi1 chuan2]
to divorce/divorced from (one's spouse)
shady relationship/affair/adulterous relationship
